onTheDashboardSubmenu: On the Dashboard Submenu, you will see a sales graph along with sales details and transaction details. You can use the time and outlet filters to modify the chart as desired
inTheMainMenuOfTheReport: In the main menu of the report, you can see the Sales Summary of your business. The displayed sales summary can be adjusted using the time and place filters available on the right side of the menu. There is also an export button that allows you to view Sales Summary data in .xls form
inTheMainMenuOfTheProductModule: In the main menu of the product module, you will see the Product List of your business. You can view product data that has been created in your business, along with the stock and status of the product. Product status can be changed to inactive or active, which can be used to remove products from the product list in the BeetPOS application (if inactive). You can edit or delete products for each product
inTheInventoryModule: In the Inventory module, you can manage the stock for each of your products. Perform stock entry activities, stock releases, stock transfers, to make stock taking documents and purchase orders
inTheKitchenModule: In the kitchen module, you can add and manage the raw materials contained in your business. Use the recipe menu to build recipes for your products, and input ingredients into recipes to automatically reduce ingredients
inTheMainOutletMenu: In the main Outlet menu, there is a display of Outlets that have been created for your business. At each outlet, there is also a dropdown that can be used to view outlet data quickly (quickview). You can select the edit outlet option on each outlet to change the data in the outlet edit popup. Adding a new Outlet
inTheSpecialPromoMenu: In the special promo menu, you can create a promo that can be activated when the customer is about to make a payment. This discount can be activated manually after the customer meets the criteria you provide (Ex. Student Discount, Birthday Discount, etc.). This promo can provide discounts using rupiah or percentage
onTheStaffMenu: On the Staff menu, the staff who are currently active in your business will be displayed. Each Staff will have personal data along with the Role data of the Staff. The data role on the staff will determine the access rights of the staff, both in terms of the BeetPOS cashier application and BeetPOS Backoffice
theMainRoleMenuWillShowTheRolesThatExist: The main role menu will show the roles that exist in your business. This menu displays the type of access that has been granted to each role in the Access column
inTheCustomerManagementMainMenu: In the customer management main menu, customers who have registered with your business will be displayed here. You can see the details of each customer by selecting the customer details menu in the Actions column. In the customer detail menu, complete information about the customer will be displayed, along with purchase statistics and transaction history from the customer
recordTheCommissionsEarnedByYourStaffUsi: Record the commissions earned by your staff using the commission module. Create commission groups and define commission rules and rates for your staff. The commission that will be earned by your staff can be seen in the report menu
onTheAccountInformationMenu: On the Account Information menu, data about your account will be displayed according to the data you filled in. To change Account Information data, you can select Change Account Information, and enter the data you want to change. Changes to staff passwords and PINs can also be done on the Change Account Information menu
seeTheStatusOfYourBeetPOSSubscriptionHer: See the status of your beetPOS subscription here. Complete the data through the subscription menu, add an outlet quota and select the type of subscription payment through this menu
simplifyYourBusinessTransactionsByRegist: Simplify your business transactions by registering your business on this menu. Use the Payment Gateway feature from BeetPOS partners to make online transactions with automatic confirmation for every online payment listed on this menu
inTheAssemblyModule: In the assembly module, you can add and manage the raw materials contained in your business. Use the recipe menu to build recipes for your products, and input ingredients into recipes to automatically reduce ingredients
